text: ` Like a child with an important message to tell ... ( Skins ' ) faults are easy to forgive because the intentions are lofty . '
That Haynes can both maintain and dismantle the facades that his genre and his character construct is a wonderous accomplishment of veracity and narrative grace .
A flick about our infantilized culture that is n't entirely infantile .
I ca n't say this enough : This movie is about an adult male dressed in pink jammies .
When it comes out on video , then it 's the perfect cure for insomnia .
